raw_text: DE SILVA – MR NIHAN (Past Pupil of Maris Stella College,​ a former member of the College 1st XI Cricket Team and Undergraduate at Sri Lanka Institute of Textile & Apparel),​ beloved eldest son of Mr Rohan de Silva (Director of Aaron Textiles Lanka Pvt. Ltd.) and Mrs Nishani Fernando (Director of Haggai International),​ loving elder brother of Nimesh de Silva and Daniel de Silva has called on to the hands of our Lord. The funeral arrangements will be at the Roman Catholic Cemetery at Kanuwana,​ Ja-Ela,​ after the religious proceedings on 8 August 2023 at 3.30 p.m. May all who love the demise and the affected family be notified about the grievance from the family,​ relatives and all brothers and sisters of Nihan de Silva at No 42,​ Mount Calvary Road,​ Ja-Ela.049174

DR. WEERASEKARA J.K.S. – Dr. Susiri (Retired Consultant Orthopaedic Surgeon),​ husband of Dr. Keerthilatha Hettiarachchi (nee Karunasekara),​ father & father-in-law of Asha & Anura Mayadunne,​ Nayana & Rajeev Samarasinghe,​ Kalum & Suranga Jayabandu,​ brother & brother-in-law of late Drs. Malini & W.A.S. De Silva,​ late Padma & Lakshman De Silva,​ Lakshmi and late Dileepa Munasinghe,​ Jagath & Chandrika Weerasekara,​ loving grandfather of Dinali,​ Vinuki,​ Dillon,​ Tanuri & Tevin passed away on 7th August 2023. Cremation on Wednesday 9th August 2023 at 4.00 p.m. at the Borella Cemetery (Devi Balika side). No. 84,​ Dewala Road,​ Nugegoda.049183
